SUMMARY

CAREER OBJECTIVES
An accomplished Chemical Engineer and IT Professional, with 10+ years of International work experience in Chemical Engineer Development.
Skilled in research and data analysis and experienced in solving complex problems.
Seeking to attain a position where I can use my experience in Chemical Engineering and educational background in IT.
